title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include an acceptable description. Acceptable descriptions include the following.

路 (Enzymatic) hydrolysis occurs between the sugars and phosphates/nucleotides.

路 The covalent bonds between the sugars and phosphates/nucleotides are broken.

The response includes an acceptable description. Acceptable descriptions include the following.

路 (Enzymatic) hydrolysis occurs between the sugars and phosphates/nucleotides.

路 The covalent bonds between the sugars and phosphates/nucleotides are broken.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include a description that (in general) there is a direct correlation/positive relationship (between the number of double-strand breaks and the number of chromatid crossovers).
The response includes a description that (in general) there is a direct correlation/positive relationship (between the number of double-strand breaks and the number of chromatid crossovers).
